snippet.title: Ruzar - The Life Stone - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Ruzar - The Life Stone is a first-person, grid-based dungeon crawler inspired from the famous Dungeon Master Series. 

This video shows more core gameplay elements.

Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/hammerglstudio
Like us on FaceBook: http://www.facebook.com/hammerglassstudio 
Web Site: http://www.hammerglassstudio.com
Vote on Steam GreenLight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=416010098
